contents.name: README
contents.contents: Hi! My name is Cole Gerdemann. I'm a Computer Engineering student with a passion for open-source projects, Linux, space systems, robotics, networking, and computer vision. I love taking the initiative and coming up with my own ideas and projects on the job, and want to work with you! I love challenges and am an extremely fast learner. Take a look at my resume and feel free to reach out with any questions, I am always happy to talk! You can contact me by typing 'contact' in this prompt.

contents.name: GitHub
contents.description: I love open-source projects... Find out what I'm working on here.

contents.name: artifical_retinas_in_orbit
contents.description: I wrote the software to automate this process

contents.name: dancing_cubelabs
contents.description: I led the software development for this project

contents.name: project-cole
contents.description: Next gen dashboard + CAN interface for the new KY solar car. WIP.

contents.name: blur-my-shell
contents.description: A Gnome extension implementing blur effects on the desktop.

contents.name: CanvasTasks
contents.description: Automatically pull assignments from Canvas into Google Tasks.

contents.name: PixelWatchFace
contents.description: Minimalistic and open-source watchface for WearOS. 80,000+ downloads.

contents.name: GotoSleep
contents.description: Reminds you to sleep. aggressively. forever. until you do. 100,000+ downloads.

contents.name: FRC-TensorFlow-Vision
contents.description: A first-for-FIRST TensorFlow-based vision system for 2018 FRC game.

contents.name: NOHS-Edge-Client
contents.description: Alternative app to my high school's one, but better. My first app ever.

contents.name: basketballvision
contents.description: HS Project allowing blind people to play basketball using LASERS.
